agus.formula

Class FORMULA_ORBITAL

  • java.lang.Object
    • agus.formula.FORMULA_ORBITAL

  • public class FORMULA_ORBITAL
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides all formulas needed for orbital calculations
    Author:
    Niklas Heidenreich

                                       double a)

        a - the semi major axis
        Returns:
        the mean angular motion in rad/sec
